channel.title: Wtf, is it me or most keygen are for uTorrent nowadays?
channel.description: Wierd, I went searching for a keygen for my photoshop CS3 and all I could find was uTorrent downloads, i hardly found any sites where they just had the serial code or/+ the activation key with them. I'm starting to think these uTorrent files are all viruses, anyone else noticed this?

item.title: Wtf, is it me or most keygen are for uTorrent nowadays?
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

torrent files are a more efficient way of moving a file around, thats why people use them

Read full topic

item.title: Wtf, is it me or most keygen are for uTorrent nowadays?
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

Why would it matter whether or not the keygen was just a file hosted on a site, or a torrent? They could both be safe, or they could both be harmful, regardless of where/how they are hosted.

Read full topic

item.title: Wtf, is it me or most keygen are for uTorrent nowadays?
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

what i believe he thinks is going on, is the .torrent files say utorrent on them, am i right? So he thinks they’re all utorrent. But in reality, he’s just a retard and doesn’t understand how to torrent properly. they’re not all keyloggers, it’s a false positive.

item.title: Wtf, is it me or most keygen are for uTorrent nowadays?

item.description:
@lordbost wrote:

Server-Unknown.Net:

Wierd, I went searching for a keygen for my photoshop CS3 and all I could find was uTorrent downloads, i hardly found any sites where they just had the serial code or/+ the activation key with them. I’m starting to think these uTorrent files are all viruses, anyone else noticed this?

Do you mean torrent files?

item.title: Wtf, is it me or most keygen are for uTorrent nowadays?
item.dc:creator: @Unhandled Unhandled
item.description:
@Unhandled wrote:

Server-Unknown.Net:

No, im just saying: Isn’t it sort of suspicious though??? I saw a video on utube (lol i call youtube: utube :p) of how keygens get your computer information, so im just so carious after that… Well it wasnt on utube but I saw it on a website i ran across yesterday. Been very cautious of what i download every since then

Anti piracy’s FUD.

Read full topic
